verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
verse 1
Fight the good fight
With all thy might
Christ is thy strength
And Christ thy might
Lay hold of life and it shall be
Thy joy and crown eternally

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Run the straight race
Through God's good grace
Lift up thine eyes
And seek His face
Life with its way before us lies
Christ is the path
and Christ the prize

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cast care aside
Lean on thy Guide
His boundless mercy will provide
Trust and thy trusting
Soul shall prove
Christ is its life
And Christ its love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Faint not, nor fear
His arms are near
He changeth not
And thou art dear
Only believe
And thou shalt see
That Christ is all
In all to thee
